content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":92591,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あと、単純に――","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Also, simply――\""},{"lineNumber":92592,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ボクは君に勝ちたい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I want to win against you.\""},{"lineNumber":92593,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ〜……うー、いやぁ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah... ugh, well...\""},{"lineNumber":92594,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こういう言い方嫌いなんすけど……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I hate saying it like this, but...\""},{"lineNumber":92595,"originalJapaneseLine":"「正直、力量差がありすぎて、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Honestly, there’s such a difference in skill,"},{"lineNumber":92596,"originalJapaneseLine":"　団長さんじゃ敵わないと思います……よ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"I don't think the leader can win... you know?\""},{"lineNumber":92597,"originalJapaneseLine":"「敵わないことが諦める理由になるものか。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Not winning is no reason to give up."},{"lineNumber":92598,"originalJapaneseLine":"　さあ、もう一度勝負だ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Now, let's have another match!\""},{"lineNumber":92599,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"............\""},{"lineNumber":92600,"originalJapaneseLine":"（ああ、この人……）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Ah, this person...)"},{"lineNumber":92601,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":92602,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　＜スパァァァァン！＞","translatedEnglishLine":"　<SPAAAN!>"},{"lineNumber":92603,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐはぁっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Guhah!\""},{"lineNumber":92604,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"............"},{"lineNumber":92605,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"......"},{"lineNumber":92606,"originalJapaneseLine":"「その時、ウチは決めたんですよ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"At that moment, I decided..."},{"lineNumber":92607,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ああ、この人についていこうって」","translatedEnglishLine":"Yeah, I'll follow this person.\""},{"lineNumber":92608,"originalJapaneseLine":"「い、意味が分からん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-I don't understand...\""},{"lineNumber":92609,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス城の医務室でサーナキアが","translatedEnglishLine":"In the infirmary of Rance Castle, Sarnakia"},{"lineNumber":92610,"originalJapaneseLine":"呆れていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"was exasperated."},{"lineNumber":92611,"originalJapaneseLine":"「というわけで、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So then,"},{"lineNumber":92612,"originalJapaneseLine":"　とっとと食あたりなんて治して下さいね。","translatedEnglishLine":"please get over your food poisoning quickly."},{"lineNumber":92613,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ついていく人がいなくなったら困るんで」","translatedEnglishLine":"It’d be a problem if you didn’t have anyone to follow.\""},{"lineNumber":92614,"originalJapaneseLine":"「てか、食あたりって……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"By the way, food poisoning...\""},{"lineNumber":92615,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どこで何を拾い食いしたんすか」","translatedEnglishLine":"Where and what did you scavenge and eat?\""},{"lineNumber":92616,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うぐ、お前は……ボクをなんだと……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh, you... what do you take me for...?"},{"lineNumber":92617,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あたっ、あたたた……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ouch, ouch ouch...\""},{"lineNumber":92618,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しかし……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But..."},{"lineNumber":92619,"originalJapaneseLine":"　話を聞いてもお前が","translatedEnglishLine":"even after hearing this, I don’t understand why you"},{"lineNumber":92620,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ボクについていく理由が分からん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"would want to follow me...\""},{"lineNumber":92621,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………まあいい。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"............ Well, whatever."},{"lineNumber":92622,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お前相手に真面目に考えるのは疲れる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Thinking seriously about you tires me out."},{"lineNumber":92623,"originalJapaneseLine":"　腹も痛いし……」","translatedEnglishLine":"My stomach hurts, too...\""},{"lineNumber":92624,"originalJapaneseLine":"「死なないで下さいねー。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Please don’t die, okay?"},{"lineNumber":92625,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ウチ、団長に死なれたら悲しいんで」","translatedEnglishLine":"I’d be sad if the leader died.\""},{"lineNumber":92626,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふんっ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph."},{"lineNumber":92627,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お前を一人前の騎士にするまで誰が死ぬか」","translatedEnglishLine":"Who’s going to die before I make you a full-fledged knight?\""},{"lineNumber":92628,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"............\""},{"lineNumber":92629,"originalJapaneseLine":"（そういうことサラッと言える人だから、","translatedEnglishLine":"(Because he can say things like that so casually,"},{"lineNumber":92630,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ついていってるんですよ）","translatedEnglishLine":"that's why I’m following him.)"},{"lineNumber":92631,"originalJapaneseLine":"（――なんて言っても","translatedEnglishLine":"(Even if I say that,"},{"lineNumber":92632,"originalJapaneseLine":"　キョトンとするだけなんだろうなぁ）","translatedEnglishLine":"he'd probably just look blankly.)"},{"lineNumber":92633,"originalJapaneseLine":"（言わないっすけどね）","translatedEnglishLine":"(But I won’t say it.)"},{"lineNumber":92634,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それより訓練に戻れ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"More importantly, get back to training."},{"lineNumber":92635,"originalJapaneseLine":"　サボりは許さんぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I won’t allow slacking off.\""},{"lineNumber":92636,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、ウチ強いから訓練いらないんで。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, I'm strong, so I don’t need training."},{"lineNumber":92637,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ここで看病してるっす」","translatedEnglishLine":"I’m staying here to nurse you.\""},{"lineNumber":92638,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐっ、言い返せない」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Guh, I can’t argue against that.\""},{"lineNumber":92639,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いいか、いずれ絶対にボクが勝つからな！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Listen, I will definitely win someday!"},{"lineNumber":92640,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いつまでも余裕顔でいられると思うなよ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Don’t think you can keep that confident smile forever!\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こういう言い方嫌いなんすけど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I hate saying it like this, but..."
"Honestly, there’s such a difference in skill,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 団長さんじゃ敵わないと思います……よ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't think the leader can win... you know?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「敵わないことが諦める理由になるものか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Not winning is no reason to give up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その時、ウチは決めたんですよ……
ああ、この人についていこうって」
ランス城の医務室でサーナキアが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the infirmary of Rance Castle, Sarnakia

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とっとと食あたりなんて治して下さいね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: please get over your food poisoning quickly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ついていく人がいなくなったら困るんで」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’d be a problem if you didn’t have anyone to follow."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どこで何を拾い食いしたんすか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Where and what did you scavenge and eat?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うぐ、お前は……ボクをなんだと……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh, you... what do you take me for...?
even after hearing this, I don’t understand why you

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ボクについていく理由が分からん……」
お前相手に真面目に考えるのは疲れる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thinking seriously about you tires me out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウチ、団長に死なれたら悲しいんで」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’d be sad if the leader died."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前を一人前の騎士にするまで誰が死ぬか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Who’s going to die before I make you a full-fledged knight?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （そういうことサラッと言える人だから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Because he can say things like that so casually,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ついていってるんですよ）
キョトンとするだけなんだろうなぁ）
「あ、ウチ強いから訓練いらないんで。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, I'm strong, so I don’t need training.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここで看病してるっす」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’m staying here to nurse you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いいか、いずれ絶対にボクが勝つからな！
いつまでも余裕顔でいられると思うなよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don’t think you can keep that confident smile forever!"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
